sentences.en: "I changed my mind," Blanche said, resuming her seat.
sentences.cn: “我改变主意了，”布兰奇说着回到她的座位上。

sentences.en: "Take a seat," he said in a bored tone.
sentences.cn: “请坐，”他不耐烦地说道。

sentences.en: a 10,000-seat stadium
sentences.cn: 万人体育场

sentences.en: an inexperienced pilot who had to fly the aircraft by the seat of her pants.
sentences.cn: 一个不得不徒手驾驶飞机的无经验的飞行员

sentences.en: He is to remain in the hot seat as chief executive.
sentences.cn: 他将继续留在公司总经理这个不好坐的位子上。

sentences.en: He ran the business by the seat of his pants.
sentences.cn: 他凭经验和直觉做生意

sentences.en: He rose from his seat and made for the door.
sentences.cn: 他从椅子上起身向门口走去。

sentences.en: He waved toward a chair, and seated himself at the desk.
sentences.cn: 他朝一把椅子一挥手，在桌旁坐了下来。

sentences.en: I got bubblegum on the seat of Nanna's car.
sentences.cn: 我把泡泡糖弄到了娜娜的车座上。

sentences.en: I had a ringside seat for the whole performance.
sentences.cn: 整场表演我都坐在场边前排座位上。

sentences.en: I was in the back seat and Jo was driving.
sentences.cn: 我在后座，乔开车。

sentences.en: It burned clean through the seat of my overalls.
sentences.cn: 它把我工装裤屁股那块烧透了。

sentences.en: It's easy to get a seat at the best shows in town.
sentences.cn: 很容易搞到城里顶级演出的票。

sentences.en: Kate laughed, and sank down again to her seat.
sentences.cn: 凯特笑了，又坐回到她的座位上。

sentences.en: People were shifting in their seats, looking uncomfortable.
sentences.cn: 人们在座位上动来动去，看上去不大自在。

sentences.en: Ramesh had reclined his seat and was lying back smoking.
sentences.cn: 拉梅什把椅背调低，倚在上面吸烟。

sentences.en: She slipped into the driving seat and closed the door.
sentences.cn: 她溜进了驾驶座，关上了门。

sentences.en: Sister Francesca entered the chapel, took her seat, and promptly fell asleep.
sentences.cn: 弗朗西丝卡修女走进小教堂，坐下来，很快就睡着了。

sentences.en: The arena seats 60,000.
sentences.cn: 这个圆形运动场能坐六万人。

sentences.en: The gentleman, despite his advanced years, helped Kathryn back to her seat.
sentences.cn: 这位绅士，尽管年事已高，仍然帮着凯瑟琳回到座位上。

sentences.en: The person can transfer from wheelchair to seat with relative ease.
sentences.cn: 那个人可以比较轻松地从轮椅上移到座位上。

sentences.en: You can pay to be upgraded to a business class seat.
sentences.cn: 你可以付费升级到商务舱。

words.tran_cn: 为…领座；为…提供座位（seat的ing形式）
使…坐下；可容纳…的；使就职

phrases.phrase: by the seat of (one's) pants&I{【俚语】}

phrases.tran_cn: 处于默默无闻的地位；处于次要地位；退居二线
就座（尤指坐在指定的位置）

trans.tran_cn: 席位，座位，所在地，场所，臀部
trans.tran_en: a place where you can sit, especially one in a vehicle or one from which you watch a performance, sports event etc

trans.tran_cn: 使…坐下；可容纳…的；使就职
trans.tran_en: If you seat yourself somewhere, you sit down

trans.tran_cn: 使就座，使就职，使获得座位（或席位），可容纳若干座位
